statements: SELECT * FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE claim_id = 1;
SELECT property_owner_id, damage_type FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT claim_status, claim_id FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE damage_type = 'Water Damage';
SELECT property_owner_id, claim_status FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE claim_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE damage_type = 'Fire Damage' AND claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_id, property_owner_id, damage_type, claim_status FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE claim_status='Pending';
SELECT * FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE property_owner_id=1234 ORDER BY claim_id DESC;
SELECT claim_id, damage_type FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE damage_type='Fire' OR damage_type='Flood' ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT property_owner_id, claim_status FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE damage_type='Vandalism' AND claim_status='Approved';
SELECT claim_id, claim_status FROM PropertyDamageClaims WHERE property_owner_id=5678 ORDER BY claim_id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM property_claims;
SELECT claim_id, property_id, claim_date FROM property_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, property_id, claim_description FROM property_claims WHERE property_id = 100;
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, phone_number FROM property_owners WHERE property_id = 200 ORDER BY owner_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM property_claims WHERE property_id = 1;
SELECT owner_name, phone_number FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 2;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, claim_description FROM property_claims WHERE claim_date > '2021-01-01' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT property_id, claim_description FROM property_claims WHERE property_id IN (1, 3, 5) ORDER BY claim_id ASC;
SELECT property_id, COUNT(*) AS claim_count FROM property_claims GROUP BY property_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, property_owner_id, damage_description, status FROM claims;
SELECT claim_id, date_submitted, status, damage_description FROM claims WHERE status='approved';
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE name='John Smith';
SELECT claim_id, action_date, action_description, action_taken_by FROM claim_actions ORDER BY action_date DESC;
SELECT claim_id, date_submitted, damage_description, status FROM claims WHERE status = 'pending';
SELECT * FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1001;
SELECT claim_id, status, property_owner_id, date_submitted FROM claims ORDER BY date_submitted DESC;
SELECT * FROM claim_actions WHERE action_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY action_date ASC;
SELECT claim_id, action_description, action_taken_by FROM claim_actions JOIN claims ON claim_actions.claim_id = claims.claim_id WHERE status = 'approved';
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT owner_name, property_address FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT * FROM Claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT claim_description, claim_status FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';

SELECT owner_name, payment_amount, payment_date FROM PropertyOwners JOIN Claims ON PropertyOwners.owner_id = Claims.owner_id JOIN Payments ON Claims.claim_id = Payments.claim_id ORDER BY payment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM PropertyOwners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name, property_address FROM PropertyOwners ORDER BY owner_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT claim_id, claim_description, claim_date FROM Claims WHERE claim_status = 'Approved';
SELECT * FROM Inspections JOIN Claims ON Inspections.claim_id = Claims.claim_id WHERE inspector_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT item_description, item_value FROM claim_items ORDER BY item_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM claims WHERE status = 'Pending' ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email, adjuster_phone FROM adjusters;
SELECT * FROM property_owners;
SELECT owner_id, owner_name FROM property_owners WHERE owner_id = 1;
SELECT claim_id, claim_date, status FROM claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000;
SELECT item_description, item_value FROM claim_items WHERE item_value < 500;
SELECT adjuster_name, adjuster_email, adjuster_phone FROM adjusters;
